definitions.definition: The body or any of its matter that are left after a person (or any organism) dies; a corpse .
examples: They buried the remains of their longtime friend in the town cemetery.
The victim's remains were one small piece of bone.

definitions.definition: The extant writings of a deceased person.
examples: To his great intellectual powers his published remains bear abundant witness.

definitions.definition: All that is left of the stock of some things; remnants .
examples: He couldn't bring himself to eat the remains of the chicken dinner.

main_definition: The body or any of its matter that are left after a person (or any organism) dies; a corpse .
secondary_definitions: The extant writings of a deceased person.
All that is left of the stock of some things; remnants .
